name: Vertigo Fields_[09]
description:
“Sound is the basis of all creation” _Hans Jenny. Rotating fields of standing waves, a computational/coded approach to the acoustic phenomena known as CYMATICS. 
This is an extension of a research thesis I did in 2017 about molding matter through sound.
1080 x1080 30FPS, 451 Frames. Still Frame animation.
Technique: Python programming on acoustic formulas by @arquiaz
